snippet: Museums on both sides of the Atlantic are holding special events to observe the 100th anniversary of the luxury liner’s only voyage.
lead_paragraph: Museums on both sides of the Atlantic are holding special events to observe the 100th anniversary of the luxury liner’s only voyage.

headline.seo: Titanic Exhibitions on the Centennial of Its Sinking
headline.main: Titanic the Ship, 100 Years Later, Becomes a Bandwagon
headline.print_headline: Titanic the Ship, 100 Years Later, Becomes a Bandwagon
